column2: "Afei Filistiafo poon hɔn dɔm nyinara bae behyiaa Afek: na Israelfo kɛkyeer nsera wɔ nsunyiwa a ɔwɔ Jezreel no nkyɛn."
"Na Filistiafo asafohemfo no botwaa mu ɔha ɔha na apem apem mu: na David na ne mbarimba no ka Akis ho botwaa mu wɔ nkyidɔm no mu."

column3: Hebriwfo yi reyɛ ha dɛn? Na Akis see Filistiafo asafohemfo no dɛ
column5: Israelhen Saul n'akowaa a ɔnye me atsena dɛm nda yi
column6: anaa dɛm mfe yi a munnhun mfom biara wɔ no mu ɔdze ebodu ndɛ da yi no bi a?"

column2: "Na Filistiafo asafohemfo no hɔn bo fuuw no; na Filistiafo asafohemfo no see no dɛ
column4: na ɔnkɔ ne tsenabew mbrɛ edze no tsenae no bio
column5: na mma ɔnnye hɛn nnkɔ akono
column6: amma ɔaanndan n'enyi wɔ hɛn do wɔ ɔko no mu: na ebɛnadze na oyi dze bɛpata no wura? Ana nnyɛ mbarimba yi hɔn etsir bi a?"

column2: "Ana nnyɛ oyi nye David a wɔtoow no ho ndwom wɔ asaw mu dɛ
column4: Na David ne mpedu mpedu no?"

column6: na wo nkɔrmbaa wɔ me nkyɛn wɔ dɔm no mu no ye wɔ m'enyi do: na ofitsi da a ebaa me nkyɛn ɔdze ebodu ndɛ da yi munnhun bɔn bi wɔ wo mu: naaso asafohemfo no wɔmmpen wo."
amma aannyɛ ma Filistiafo asafohemfo hɔn bo eemmfuw."

column3: Na ebɛnadze na mayɛ? Na ebɛnadze na ofitsi dɛ mebaa w'enyim dze ebodu ndɛ da yi ehu no w'akowaa mu
column4: ma dɛm ntsi mma monnkɔ mennkɛnye mo wura ɔhen n'atamfo nkɔko yi?"

column2: "Na Akis buae na ɔsee David dɛ
column3: Minyim dɛ iye wɔ m'enyi do dɛ Nyankopɔn no bɔfoe: naaso Filistiafo asafohemfo na wɔaka dɛ
enye wo wura no nkowaa a wɔnye wo bae no nsoɛr ahanamakye: na hom soɛr ahanamakye ara

column4: dɛ worisi mu anapa no wɔasan akɔ Filistiafo hɔn asaase do. Na Filistiafo no sii mu kɔr Jezreel."
